alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Monmouth; Morris; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 07 at 9:10PM EST until March 07 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN MORRIS...SOUTHEASTERN HUNTERDON...MERCER... SOMERSET...MONMOUTH...MIDDLESEX...EAST CENTRAL MONTGOMERY AND EAST CENTRAL BUCKS COUNTIES... At 909 PM EST, severe showers and embedded thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ridgewood to Plainfield to near Richboro, moving east at 60 mph. This line has a history of producing areas of wind damage. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Trenton, New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Long Branch, Morristown, Asbury Park, Somerville, Somerset, Edison, Middletown, Old Bridge, Howell, East Brunswick, Bridgewater, South Brunswick, Sayreville, North Brunswick, Marlboro, Manalapan and Ewing. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 8 and 12. Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 32 and 41. Interstate 80 in New Jersey between mile markers 44 and 47. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 9. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 61 and 76. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 20, between mile markers 25 and 42, and between mile markers 47 and 53. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 99 and 133. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This line of heavy showers and embedded thunderstorms may contain little or no lightning. Do not wait until you hear thunder before taking cover.

area.areaDesc: Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Monmouth; Morris; Somerset
